info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 12:56PM MST until August 28 at 1:45PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 145 PM MST. * At 1256 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blake Ranch Road, or 12 miles east of Kingman, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Wild Cow Campground, Dw Ranch Road, Blake Ranch Road, Hualapai Mountain Park and Hualapai Peak. This includes Interstate 40 in Arizona between mile markers 60 and 75. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
